description: KL-01 is the Regional Transport Office serving Thiruvananthapuram city, the capital of Kerala. As the primary RTO in the state, it manages a high volume of vehicle registrations, driving licenses, and transport permits for the metropolitan area.
address: Regional Transport Office, 2nd Floor, Transport Bhavan, East Fort, Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala

description: KL-02 is the Regional Transport Office (RTO) for Kollam, serving as one of the primary transport hubs in southern Kerala. It handles vehicle registrations, driving license issuances, and enforcement of motor vehicle regulations for the Kollam city and surrounding taluk areas.
address: Regional Transport Office, Civil Station, Collectorate P.O, Kollam, Kerala

description: The KL-03 Regional Transport Office (RTO) is the primary vehicle registration and licensing authority for the Pathanamthitta district. It handles a wide range of services including the issuance of permanent driving licenses, registration of new vehicles, and collection of road taxes.
address: Regional Transport Office, 2nd Floor, Civil Station, Pathanamthitta, Kerala

description: KL-04 is the Regional Transport Office (RTO) serving the Alappuzha district headquarters. It is responsible for vehicle registration, driving license issuance, and enforcement of transport regulations within the Ambalappuzha taluk and surrounding regions.
address: Regional Transport Office, Ground Floor, Civil Station, Alappuzha, Kerala
